items.summary: Remove the entire Home screen promotional card section shown in the provided screenshot (the orange card with the title “Plan Meaningful Moments”, the “Add Your Moment” button, and the character image). This removal must be implemented by deleting the corresponding promo-card block in `frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx` so that the section is no longer rendered on Home.

Fetch the user’s location automatically via browser geolocation (permission-based) by default, and persist the result into the existing local-first user profile so it appears wherever `profile.location` is displayed (e.g., the Moments image card header). Ensure denial/unavailability is handled gracefully without breaking the UI.

Make glassmorphic styling the new visual standard for cards across the app (excluding buttons). Implement a reusable glass card style (CSS utility/class) and update existing card containers that currently render as solid white cards (e.g., `frontend/src/components/MomentsImageCard.tsx` outer card and the Home empty-state card in `frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx`) to use the glassmorphic style while keeping all button styles unchanged.
